actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate regarding automobile carriers.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that: (1) the President should initiate negotiations with Japan to open up the vehicle carrier trade between the United States and Japan to include participation by U.S. shipping firms in long-term, core vehicle transportation contracts; and (2) the President should report to the Congress on the progress of such negotiations within 90 days after the Senate agrees to this resolution.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate regarding automobile carriers.
